Player History
Signed as a free agent by Milwaukee on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/8/1985 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 5/11/1986, off Charlie Leibrandt (KC)...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 4/6/1987...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1987, hitting .378 with 8 HR, 29 RBI...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,150,000 through salary arbitration...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,150,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 6/2/1989 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 4-5 weeks...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,150,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/24/1990, hitting .423 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 2/16/1991 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 5/20/1991...
Drove in 6 runs against Chicago on 6/16/1991...
Won World Series with San Diego in 1991...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/12/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
